title: Vibrant Medical Records Viewer
description: A premium, visually stunning UI template for viewing medical records with a vibrant sunset gradient theme.
generation_hints: Use @tanstack/react-table for advanced sorting, filtering, and pagination
Implement recharts to display patient vitals trends in modal view

Add keyboard shortcuts for quick actions (Ctrl+E to edit, Ctrl+D to delete)
Use framer-motion for smooth table row animations on add/delete
Implement search debouncing to reduce API calls
Add multi-select functionality with checkbox column
Use toast notifications for successful CRUD operations
Implement row-level actions menu with edit/delete/view options

Add column visibility toggle for customizable table view
